backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods or logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a hero‑logo resize request to affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for all frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining global OKLCH variables, light/dark themes, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component handling hash-based routing and rendering pages with navbar and footer.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Netlify-compatible contact form with controlled inputs and simple submit handler.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Gradient footer with attribution link and animated heart icon.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Sticky responsive navbar with scroll effects, desktop links, and mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/ServiceCard.tsx: Reusable service card showing an icon, title, description, and gradient accent.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and caching authenticated or anonymous backend actors using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity auth state and client lifecycle.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and defines extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes along with utility classes for global typography and custom components.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutWhyPage.tsx: Renders an About page with hero, story, and philosophy sections using images, gradients, and icon‑based feature blocks.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays a contact page with hero text, contact details, and an embedded ContactForm component.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the home page featuring a hero section with branding, navigation buttons, and animated elements, along with feature sections.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Shows a programs/services page with a hero section, grid of ServiceCard items, and a CTA section.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, typography, animations, container settings, and extended theme options including brand colors and UI presets.
project_state.json: Project state file defining site goals, architecture notes, and a list of existing features for a colorful Netlify-ready static website.
